title: Farewells: Workplace (Usefulness 3)
description: Traveler usefulness 3/10 phrases for the Workplace subcategory within Farewells. Includes 3 card(s).

cards.romaji: O-saki ni shiturei shimasu. O-tsukare-sama deshita.
cards.japanese: お先に失礼します。お疲れ様でした。

cards.english: It's been a long hard day.
